mapper.insert: insert into user(userid, userpw, username, email, regdate, userinfo) values(#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{email}, now(), #{userinfo});
insert into player(userid, name, age, sex, height, weight, position, info) values(#{userid}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{position}, #{info});
mapper.update: update user set userpw = #{userpw} , email = #{email} where userid = #{userid}
